name: Sushi
description: Vinegared rice with various toppings such as raw fish or vegetables.

name: Tacos
description: Soft or crispy tortillas filled with ingredients like meat, beans, and cheese.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Pasta with a creamy sauce made from eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Borscht
description: A beet soup that is often served hot or cold, sometimes with sour cream.

name: Baklava
description: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with nuts and honey or syrup.

name: Dim Sum
description: A variety of small, flavorful dishes like dumplings, buns, and rolls, often enjoyed with tea.

name: Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky pastry that’s often enjoyed for breakfast.

name: Ceviche
description: Fresh seafood marinated in citrus juices with onions, cilantro, and chili peppers.

name: Poutine
description: French fries topped with cheese curds and smothered in gravy.

name: Bunny Chow
description: A hollowed-out loaf of bread filled with curry.

name: Samosas
description: Fried or baked pastries filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat.

name: Moussaka
description: A layered casserole with eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.

name: Pho
description: A fragrant noodle soup with broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, often beef or chicken.

name: Kebabs
description: Grilled skewers of meat or vegetables, often served with flatbread and various dips.

name: Arepas
description: Cornmeal cakes that can be grilled, baked, or fried and filled with various ingredients.

name: Goulash
description: A hearty stew made with meat, vegetables, and paprika.

name: Tempura
description: Seafood or vegetables battered and deep-fried until crispy.

name: Feijoada
description: A rich black bean stew with pork and beef, typically served with rice.

name: Pavlova
description: A meringue-based dessert topped with fruit and whipped cream.

name: Jollof Rice
description: A spicy, tomato-flavored rice dish often cooked with vegetables and meat.
